azurerm_storage_account_customer_managed.description: Manages a Customer Managed Key for a Storage Account.

storage_account_id.description: The ID of the Storage Account. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

key_vault_id.description: The ID of the Key Vault. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

key_name.description: The name of Key Vault Key.

key_version.description: The version of Key Vault Key.

id.description: The ID of the Storage Account.

create.description: Used when creating the Storage Account Customer Managed Keys.

update.description: Used when updating the Storage Account Customer Managed Keys.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Storage Account Customer Managed Keys.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Storage Account Customer Managed Keys.
